import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import PokemonCard from'./PokemonCard';import{fetchPokemons}from'../services/pokemonService';// PrimeReact Components
import{Paginator}from'primereact/paginator';import{Skeleton}from'primereact/skeleton';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PokemonList(){const[pokemons,setPokemons]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);const[first,setFirst]=useState(0);const[rows,setRows]=useState(20);useEffect(()=>{const initFetch=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);const results=await fetchPokemons();setPokemons(results);setIsLoading(false);};initFetch();},[]);const onPageChange=event=>{setFirst(event.first);setRows(event.rows);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto py-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"font-orbitron text-5xl text-[#0C0C0C]",children:"Pok\xE9dex"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto pb-8",children:[isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:Array.from({length:rows}).map((_,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Skeleton,{shape:"rectangle",width:"100%",height:"117px",className:"p-mb-2"},idx))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:pokemons.slice(first,first+rows).map((pokemon,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PokemonCard,{index:first+index+1,pokemon:pokemon},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paginator,{className:"pt-8",first:first,rows:rows,totalRecords:pokemons.length,onPageChange:onPageChange,pt:{pageButton:""}})]})})]});}export default PokemonList;
